transcript: No, I've got sight. Is it? Wait, is that foam? I can't even towel. Oh, actually, I guess I can't tell, but probably isn't it, isn't it? It'll probably be unmistakable, don't you think?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: What's that? Is that- Wait, is that foam?  I can't even tell.  Oh Actually, I guess if I can't tell then it probably isn't it, is it?  It will probably be unmistakable, don't you think?
